.. _class_Line2D_method_add_point:

|void| **add_point**\ (\ position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`, index\: :ref:`int<class_int>` = -1\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Line2D_method_add_point>`
